info.name: Expresso
info.description: An internal system management tool for a coffee shop called Expresso.

request.description: Retrieves all current employees in the system.

response.name: Request was successful. Response body will contain an 'employees' field with an array of objects, each representing individual employees. See the example.
Request failed. An unexpected error occured.

request.description: Creates a new employee in the system using data supplied in the request body.

response.name: Request was successful. The employee was successfully added to the system and the response body will contain the added data in the 'employee' field. See the example.
Request was not understood by server. Invalid or incomplete request may be missing a required field.
Request failed. An unexpected error occured.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the employee.

request.description: Retrieves an employee's information from the system using the supplied employeeId.

response.name: Request was successful. Response body will contain the retrieved employee information in the 'employee' field. See the example.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the employee.

response.name: Not found with the supplied id. Note: An id is invalid if it is not an integer or an entity with that id does not exist in the system.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the employee.

response.name: Request failed. An unexpected error occured.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the employee.
(Required) The unique identifier of the employee.

request.description: Retrieves all timesheet data related to an employee using the supplied employeeId.
